General.Name: CNPC Capital Co Ltd
General.Description: CNPC Capital Company Limited operates as a financial company in China and internationally. It provides financial management and diversified financial services; deposits; and credit, settlement, capital, intermediary, and investment services. The company also offers absorb public deposits; savings; short-term, medium-term, and long-term loans; bill acceptance and discounting services; personal and business loans; cards; investment and wealth management services; and investment banking and financial services. In addition, it provides direct financial leasing, after-sale leaseback, project leasing, equipment export leasing, manufacturer leasing, operating leasing, and other services; fund, chattel, real estate, securities, other property or property rights, and other trust services; and equity investment, financial product investment, etc. Further, the company offers medical health, high-end medical, accident, life, car, homeowners, travel, and other insurance products; and insurance brokerage services. CNPC Capital Company Limited was formerly known as Jinan Diesel Engine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CNPC Capital Company Limited in February 2017. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China. CNPC Capital Company Limited is a subsidiary of China National Petroleum Corporation.
